qas.question: In what year was a special edition of the iPod produced?
For what musical group was a special edition of the iPod first made?
What color was the metal on the U2 version of the iPod?
What type of media was included with purchase of the U2 version of the iPod?
Of what band did Apple present a special edition iPod 5G?
What color was the special U2 iPod model?
In what year did apple release the special U2 model of the iPod?

context: In <a0_0><a6_0>2006<a6_0/><a0_0/> Apple presented a special edition for iPod 5G of Irish rock band <a1_0><a4_0>U2<a4_0/><a1_0/>. Like its predecessor, this iPod has engraved the signatures of the four members of the band on its back, but this one was the first time the company changed the colour of the metal (not silver but <a2_0><a5_0>black<a5_0/><a2_0/>). This iPod was only available with 30GB of storage capacity. The special edition entitled purchasers to an exclusive <a3_0>video<a3_0/> with 33 minutes of interviews and performance by U2, downloadable from the iTunes Store.
